name: part_007
file: tmp_【3DLIVE】「別世界」⧸ Amane Kanata 3DLIVE ＂Another world＂【#天音かなた3周年LIVE ⧸ ホロライブ】 [szUbg1Yar5c]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_007.mov

scenes.description: Instrumental transition featuring various visual effects and outfit changes for Amane Kanata.
Amane Kanata performs the song 'Akuma no Ko' (Child of Evil).

subtitles.original:
悪魔の子
作詞・作曲: ヒグチアイ
subtitles.english:
Akuma no Ko
Written and Composed by Higuchi Ai

subtitles.original: 鉄の弾が正義の証明 つらぬけば英雄に近づいた
subtitles.english:
Iron bullets are proof of justice.
If I fire them through, I get closer to being a hero.

subtitles.original: その目を閉じて 触れてみれば 同じ形 同じ体温の悪魔
subtitles.english:
If you close your eyes and touch it,
you'll find a devil with the same shape and body temperature.

subtitles.original: 僕はダメで あいつはいいの?
subtitles.english: Why am I no good, but they are?

subtitles.original: そこに壁があっただけなのに 生まれてしまった 定め嘆くな
subtitles.english:
Even though there was just a wall there,
don't lament the fate of being born.

subtitles.original: 僕らはみんな 自由なんだから
subtitles.english: Because we are all free.

subtitles.original: 鳥のように 羽があれば
subtitles.english: If I had wings like a bird,

subtitles.original: どこへだって 行けるけど
subtitles.english: I could go anywhere,

subtitles.original: 帰る場所が なければきっと
subtitles.english: but if I have no place to return to, I surely

subtitles.original: どこへも 行けない
subtitles.english: can't go anywhere.

subtitles.original: ただただ生きるのは 嫌だ
subtitles.english: I hate just living.

subtitles.original: 世界は残酷だ
subtitles.english: The world is cruel.

subtitles.original: それでも君を愛すよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will love you.

subtitles.original: 何を犠牲にしても
subtitles.english: No matter what I have to sacrifice.

subtitles.original: それでも君を守るよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will protect you.

subtitles.original: 間違いだとしても 疑ったりしない
subtitles.english: Even if it's a mistake, I won't doubt it.

subtitles.original: 正しさとは 自分のこと 強く信じることだ
subtitles.english: Righteousness is believing in yourself strongly.

subtitles.original: 鉄の雨が降りちる情景 テレビの中 映画に見えたんだ
subtitles.english:
The scene of iron rain falling down
looked like a movie on TV.

subtitles.original: 戦争なんて愚かな凶暴 関係ない 知らない国の話
subtitles.english:
War is such foolish violence. It's a story of a
country I don't know, nothing to do with me.

subtitles.original: それならなんで あいつに組んで 黒い気持ち 隠しきれないわけ
subtitles.english:
If so, then why do I hate them?
Why can't I hide these dark feelings?

subtitles.original: 説明だって できやしないんだ 僕らはなんて不純なんだ
subtitles.english:
I can't even explain it.
We are so impure.

subtitles.original: この言葉も 訳されれば
subtitles.english: If these words are translated...

subtitles.original: 本当の意味は 伝わらない
subtitles.english: ...their true meaning won't get across.

subtitles.original: 信じるのは その目を開いて
subtitles.english: All I believe in is...

subtitles.original: 触れた世界だけ
subtitles.english: ...the world I touched with my eyes open.

subtitles.original: 世界は残酷だ
subtitles.english: The world is cruel.

subtitles.original: それそれでも君を愛すよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will love you.

subtitles.original: 何を犠牲にしても
subtitles.english: No matter what I have to sacrifice.

subtitles.original: それそれでも君を守るよ
subtitles.english: Even so, I will protect you.

subtitles.original: 選んだ人の影 捨てたものの屍
subtitles.english:
The shadow of the person I chose,
the corpses of the things I discarded.

subtitles.original: 気づいたんだ 自分の中 育つのは悪魔の子
subtitles.english:
I realized it. What grows inside me
is the child of evil.

subtitles.original: 正義の裏 犠牲の中 心には悪魔の子
subtitles.english:
Behind justice, amidst sacrifice,
there's a child of evil in my heart.

subtitles.original: 教えて 教えてよ その仕組みを
subtitles.english: Tell me, tell me how it works.

subtitles.original:
unravel
作詞・作曲: TK
subtitles.english:
unravel
Written and Composed by TK

subtitles.original: 僕の中に 誰かいるの?
subtitles.english: Is there someone inside me?

subtitles.original: 壊れた 壊れたよ この世界で
subtitles.english: It's broken, it's broken, in this world...

subtitles.original: 君が笑う
subtitles.english: ...you are laughing.
